@reduxjs/toolkit.name: Redux Toolkit
@reduxjs/toolkit.description: The official, opinionated, batteries-included toolset for efficient Redux development

zustand.name: Zustand
zustand.description: Small, fast and scalable bearbones state management solution
zustand.tradeoff: Minimal bundle, simple API, moderate performance

jotai.name: Jotai
jotai.description: Primitive and flexible state management for React
jotai.tradeoff: Very fast read/write, slower creation, unique async capabilities

mobx.name: MobX
mobx.description: Simple, scalable state management with transparent reactive programming
mobx.tradeoff: Automatic tracking, slow creation, largest bundle

valtio.name: Valtio
valtio.description: Proxy-based state management library that makes state usage simple
valtio.tradeoff: Simple API, moderate performance, good for nested mutations

@preact/signals.name: Preact Signals
@preact/signals.description: Fast and reactive signals for Preact and React with automatic dependency tracking
@preact/signals.tradeoff: Excellent balance of speed and bundle size

solid-js.name: Solid Signals
solid-js.description: Fine-grained reactivity primitive from Solid.js for building performant UIs
solid-js.tradeoff: Fastest overall, but requires Solid.js ecosystem

@sylphx/zen.name: Zen
@sylphx/zen.description: Minimal and fast state management with signal-based reactivity
@sylphx/zen.tradeoff: Similar performance to Preact, slightly larger bundle
